# TL072 Dual Op-Amp Datasheet

## Overview

The TL072 is a high-speed JFET-input operational amplifier designed for audio and general-purpose applications.

## Electrical Characteristics

| Parameter | Min | Typ | Max | Unit |
|-----------|-----|-----|-----|------|
| Supply Voltage | ±5 | ±15 | ±18 | V |
| Input Offset Voltage | - | 3 | 10 | mV |
| Input Bias Current | - | 30 | 200 | pA |
| Slew Rate | - | 13 | - | V/µs |
| Gain Bandwidth Product | - | 3 | - | MHz |

## Pin Configuration

| Pin | Name | Function |
|-----|------|----------|
| 1 | OUT1 | Output 1 |
| 2 | IN1- | Inverting Input 1 |
| 3 | IN1+ | Non-inverting Input 1 |
| 4 | VCC- | Negative Supply |
| 5 | IN2+ | Non-inverting Input 2 |
| 6 | IN2- | Inverting Input 2 |
| 7 | OUT2 | Output 2 |
| 8 | VCC+ | Positive Supply |

## Application Circuit

```
VCC+ (8)
  |
  R1 (100k)
  |
  +------ OUT1 (1)
  |
  R2 (10k)
  |
IN1+ (3) ---+
            |
IN1- (2) ---+--- C1 (100nF)
            |
           GND
```

## Features

- Low noise: 18 nV/√Hz
- High input impedance: 10^12 Ω
- Low distortion: 0.003% THD
- Wide bandwidth: DC to 3 MHz
- Dual op-amp in 8-pin DIP package

## Applications

- Audio preamplifiers
- Active filters
- Signal conditioning
- Instrumentation amplifiers
- Voltage-controlled oscillators

## Ordering Information

| Part Number | Package | Operating Temperature |
|-------------|---------|----------------------|
| TL072CP | PDIP-8 | 0°C to 70°C |
| TL072IP | PDIP-8 | -40°C to 85°C |
| TL072CD | SOIC-8 | 0°C to 70°C |
| TL072ID | SOIC-8 | -40°C to 85°C |
